entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:45 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 1:25 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: SW 18 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Flurries beginning near noon and ending this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
